decision_conditions: Insufficient and unsatisfactory information has been submitted in relation to Condition 3 (Materials) of planning permission 15/12466/FUL to demonstrate that the proposed materials would ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development within the Riverside South Conservation in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) and DM12 (Development in Conservation Areas and Affecting Heritage Assets) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.

Insufficient information has been submitted regarding the proposed boundary treatment and soft landscaping in relation to Condition 17 (Landscaping, Boundary Details and Mooring Fixtures) of planning permission 15/12466/FUL to ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required for Conditions 3 (Materials), 6 (Cycle Parking), 17 (Landscaping Scheme) and 19 (Fire Escape) of planning permission 15/12466/FUL (Variation of Condition 2 of Planning Permission 05/12214/FUL (Erection of 'boathouse' building (821m2) over the Barge Dock for use as a restaurant / cafe on first floor with ground floor reception, plant room and alterations to mooring facilities)
